about_the_game:
In the world of “Shatter and Spin” you will fight alongside your chosen spinning top partner! Childhood fantasies come to life in this realm of adventure.

Collect parts from battles to upgrade your top, each with its unique skill progression path.

Tops feature eight distinct attributes, each crucial to combat effectiveness:

Durability: Essentially the life value.
Spin Speed: Determines the top’s maximum spinning speed; the higher the speed, the more frequent the attacks.
Hardness: Increases damage dealt by the top, reduces damage received, and grants immunity to attacks from enemies with lower hardness.
Sharpness: Significantly increases damage dealt by the top.
Weight: Makes the top harder to be knocked away by enemies but reduces maneuverability.
Movement Speed: Increases the top’s movement speed and reduces spin speed loss while moving.
Critical Strike Chance: Damage from non-critical hits accumulates, releasing accumulated damage during a critical hit and knocking enemies away.
Critical Strike Damage: Enhances damage dealt during a critical hit.

Utilize the unique Weight Ring System, where each top can be equipped with six weight rings. Each ring randomly receives a primary attribute and six secondary attributes. Install the appropriate weight rings on your top partner to enhance its combat power and make it the strongest contender.



Together with your spinning top partner, shatter your enemies one by one! Break through the spiral of fate!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
